MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH6 postcode area of Edinburgh. Our engineers are now on their way to the local area and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:45pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:40pm on Saturday, 13 February 2021
